head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COHEN, ALFRED M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COHEN, ALFRED M.

block.p: COHEN-Alfred M. Died peacefully on Sunday, June 4. Beloved husband of Estelle Cohen. Loving father of Douglas, Richard and Andrew Cohen. Devoted grandfather of Maxwell Cohen, Sarah and Rachel Cohen, Josh and Nathan Typrowicz-Cohen. Caring father-in-law to Deborah, Anna and Karen. Born in Manhattan July 12, 1920. Author and publisher, ''Winning Sales Call Strategies.'' Services Monday, June 5, 1:30 PM, at Robert Schoem, Rte 4, Paramus.
